Posts.Content: Does anyone have any experience with Avemar, sold as Ave in this country? It's a fermented wheat germ supplement that has been studied in Europe since the 1980's. Also, I'm interested in feedback on a supplement called MMPower. My particular area of interest is breast cancer, but I would like feedback from anyone who has taken either or both. If so, would you email me at --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ---. Thanks. amyh1
Posts.Title: Supplements
